statements: SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT instrument_name, musician_id FROM instruments WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, instrument_name, musician_id, date_added FROM instruments WHERE musician_id = 2 ORDER BY date_added DESC;
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE 'Guitar%';
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE date_added > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE musician_id = 1 ORDER BY instrument_name DESC, date_added ASC
SELECT instrument_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM instruments GROUP BY instrument_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT id, musician_id, instrument_name, DATE_FORMAT(date_added, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM instruments WHERE musician_id IN (1, 2)
SELECT * FROM instruments WHERE date_added BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date_added DESC
SELECT instrument_name, CONCAT('Musician ID: ', musician_id) AS musician_info FROM instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE '%guitar%'
SELECT * FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, instrument_played FROM musicians ORDER BY musician_name DESC;
SELECT musician_name, instrument_played FROM musicians WHERE instrument_played='Guitar';
SELECT musician_name, instrument_played FROM musicians WHERE musician_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_musicians FROM musicians;
SELECT musician_name, instrument_played FROM musicians WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM musicians WHERE instrument_played = 'guitar' ORDER BY musician_name DESC;
SELECT musician_name, instrument_name FROM musicians JOIN instruments ON musicians.instrument_played = instruments.instrument_name WHERE instruments.instrument_type = 'string';
SELECT musician_name, COUNT(*) AS num_instruments FROM musicians GROUP BY musician_name HAVING num_instruments > 1;
SELECT musician_name, instrument_played FROM musicians WHERE instrument_played IN ('piano', 'drums') ORDER BY musician_name;
SELECT * FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_name, musician_birthdate FROM Musicians ORDER BY musician_birthdate DESC;

SELECT musician_name, instrument_name FROM Musicians, Instruments, Musicians_Instruments WHERE Musicians.musician_id = Musicians_Instruments.musician_id AND Instruments.instrument_id = Musicians_Instruments.instrument_id;

SELECT musician_name, instrument_name FROM Musicians, Instruments, Musicians_Instruments WHERE Musicians.musician_id = Musicians_Instruments.musician_id AND Instruments.instrument_id = Musicians_Instruments.instrument_id ORDER BY musician_name ASC, instrument_name DESC;
SELECT musician_name, musician_birthdate FROM Musicians WHERE musician_birthdate >= '1990-01-01';
SELECT musician_id, musician_name FROM Musicians ORDER BY musician_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Instruments WHERE instrument_name LIKE 'Guitar%';
SELECT musician_name, musician_birthdate FROM Musicians WHERE musician_birthdate < '1990-01-01';

SELECT Musicians.musician_name, Instruments.instrument_name FROM Musicians JOIN Musicians_Instruments ON Musicians.musician_id = Musicians_Instruments.musician_id JOIN Instruments ON Musicians_Instruments.instrument_id = Instruments.instrument_id;

SELECT musician_id, musician_name, instrument_name FROM Musicians JOIN Musicians_Instruments ON Musicians.musician_id = Musicians_Instruments.musician_id JOIN Instruments ON Musicians_Instruments.instrument_id = Instruments.instrument_id WHERE instrument_name = 'Piano';
SELECT * FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_name, musician_instrument FROM Musicians ORDER BY musician_name DESC;
SELECT musician_id, musician_name, musician_instrument FROM Musicians WHERE musician_instrument = 'Guitar';
SELECT * FROM Instruments WHERE instrument_type = 'String';
SELECT band_name, band_genre FROM Bands ORDER BY band_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_name, musician_instrument FROM Musicians WHERE musician_instrument = 'guitar';
SELECT m.musician_id, m.musician_name, i.instrument_name FROM Musicians m JOIN MusiciansInstruments mi ON m.musician_id = mi.musician_id JOIN Instruments i ON mi.instrument_id = i.instrument_id;
SELECT b.band_name, COUNT(mi.musician_id) AS total_musicians FROM Bands b LEFT JOIN MusiciansInstruments mi ON b.band_id = mi.musician_id GROUP BY b.band_name;

SELECT m.musician_name, i.instrument_name FROM Musicians m JOIN MusiciansInstruments mi ON m.musician_id = mi.musician_id JOIN Instruments i ON mi.instrument_id = i.instrument_id WHERE i.instrument_type = 'string';
SELECT * FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_name, instrument FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_name FROM Musicians WHERE musician_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Instruments ORDER BY instrument_name DESC;
SELECT musician_name, band_name FROM Musicians JOIN Musicians_Bands ON Musicians.musician_id = Musicians_Bands.musician_id JOIN Bands ON Musicians_Bands.band_id = Bands.band_id;
SELECT * FROM Musicians;
SELECT musician_id, musician_name FROM Musicians WHERE instrument = 'Piano';
SELECT musician_name, band_name FROM Musicians JOIN Musicians_Bands ON Musicians.musician_id = Musicians_Bands.musician_id JOIN Bands ON Musicians_Bands.band_id = Bands.band_id;
SELECT DISTINCT musician_id FROM Musicians WHERE musician_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT Bands.band_name, COUNT(Musicians_Bands.musician_id) AS total_musicians FROM Bands LEFT JOIN Musicians_Bands ON Bands.band_id = Musicians_Bands.band_id GROUP BY Bands.band_name;
